content:
Frame 1: Jack is worried about sending confidential mail to his friend because he heard that postal workers can easily open it and read it.

Jack: "I need to send a confidential letter to my friend, but I heard that postal workers can easily open it and read it. What can I do?"

Illustration: Jack is shown with a worried look on his face, holding an envelope and looking at it with concern.

Frame 2: Jack meets an employee of a special mail service and asks if there is a solution to his problem.

Jack: "Can you help me find a solution? I don't want my letter to be read by someone else."

Employee: "Yes, we have just the solution for you. We send a locker with the letter, and only the sender and receiver have the password to access it."

Illustration: Jack is shown talking to the employee, who is smiling and pointing to a sign that reads "Special Mail Service."

Frame 3: Jack sends the confidential letter in a locker, and it is delivered to his friend.

Illustration: A locker is shown being sent and delivered to Jack's friend.

Frame 4: The locker is encrypted and only accessible by the intended recipient.

Illustration: The locker is shown being encrypted and only accessible by the intended recipient.

Frame 5: Jack's friend receives the locker and opens it using the password provided by Jack.

Illustration: Jack's friend is shown receiving the locker and opening it with the password.

Frame 6: Jack's friend reads the confidential letter, and the information remains secure.

Illustration: Jack's friend is shown reading the letter, with a look of satisfaction on his face.

Frame 7: Jack is impressed by how secure and easy to use the special mail service is.

Jack: "Wow! This is amazing! My letter is secure, and it was so easy to use!"

Illustration: Jack is shown with a big smile on his face, holding his phone and looking at it with excitement.

Frame 8: Jack encourages others to start using the special mail service to protect their privacy.

Jack: "Everyone should start using this special mail service to protect their privacy."

Illustration: Jack is shown holding up a sign that reads "Special Mail Service for Privacy."

Frame 9: The employee of the special mail service nods in agreement and says that privacy is essential in this digital age.

Employee: "I completely agree. Privacy is essential in this digital age."

Illustration: The employee is shown nodding in agreement, with a sign in the background that reads "Protect your privacy with Special Mail Service."
